code: /** 1 234,56 => 1234.56 */export var priceToString=function priceToString(value){var validateStr=value.replace(/\s/g,'').replace(/,/g,'.');return Number(parseFloat(validateStr).toFixed(2)).toString();};/** 1234.56  => 1 234,56 */export var stringToPrice=function stringToPrice(value){var validateStr=value.replace(/\s/g,'').replace(/,/g,'.');var toFloat=parseFloat(validateStr).toFixed(2);var toLocal=toFloat.replace(/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g,' ');return toLocal;};/** 1 234,56 => 1234.56 */export var priceToNumber=function priceToNumber(value){var validateStr=value.replace(/\s/g,'').replace(/,/g,'.');var result=Number(parseFloat(validateStr).toFixed(2));if(isNaN(result)){return 0;}else{return result;}};
